response.job_title: Game developer | Unity | Game Designer | Web developer enthusiast | Mechanical Engineer
response.summary:
Graduated as a Mechanical Engineer at the National University of Colombia, decided to pursue my dream of becoming a Software Engineer and a game developer, which pushed me to teach myself how to program. I am a Unity  Developer with some experience in mobile games and graduated from the first Generation Colombia bootcamp, where I participated in some game jams and developed  a final project with an amazing team. I have also worked with some frontend technologies like React and with some backend like flask. I am currently learning C++.

I am passionate about creating immersive experiences and I want to leave a print with my work. I strongly believe that anyone can achieve anything if time, effort, perseverance, and passion are put onto it. I want to be part of great games and technology releases and push my creativity to its limits.

In these years learning development I have had the opportunity to create some games: two of them as personal projects and the third one as a project with a development school. I have also been involved in the frontend of some web pages. I am constantly learning anything I am curious about, and I am trying to be better every day.

You can see some of my work here: maucamsan.itch.io
Github: https://github.com/maucamsan
response.skills: Hojas de estilos en cascada (CSS), Programación orientada a objetos (POO), Desarrollo de videojuegos, C#, Inglés, Programación, Ingeniería mecánica, Estrategia, Resolución de problemas
